verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Behold what love,
What boundless love,
The Father has bestowed
On sinners lost that we should now
Be called the sons of God

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Behold
what manner of love
What manner of love
The Father hath bestowed upon us
That we
That we should be called
Should be called the sons of God

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
No longer far from Him but now
By precious blood made nigh
Accepted in the "Well-beloved"
Near to God's heart we lie

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
What we in glory soon shall be
It doth not yet appear
But when our precious Lord we see
We shall His image bear

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
With such a blessed hope in view
We would more holy be
More like our risen glorious Lord
Whose face we soon shall see
